title: New: The Japanese House – Cool Blue
content:
I keep returning to Pools to Bathe In, the debut EP from London’s The Japanese House.

Full of gorgeous textures and intimate, intricate songwriting, it’s a fully immersive listen, and by the sounds of new track Cool Blue, the second EP will be much the same. Again featuring production from The 1975’s Matthew Healy and George Daniel, it’s another addictive experience. Check it out below, alongside upcoming UK tour dates.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.

4 – Oxford – The Bullingdon
5 – Bristol – Louisiana
6 – Southampton – Joiners
7 – Brighton – Bleach
9 – Manchester – Fallow Cafe (Sold Out)
10 – Glasgow – Nice N Sleazy
11 – Leeds – Oporto
12 – Nottingham – Bodega
13 – Birmingham – Sunflower Lounge
15 – London – Barfly (Sold Out)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
